title: Founder & Friends Happy Hour
description: Hosted by Jennifer Tacheff, David Price & David Thyresson. Join an incredible group of founders at The Lighthouse in San Francisco for our Founder & Friends Happy Hour event! Why Attend? Ideas, intros, and opportunities: The right room leads to the right conversations‚Äîwhether it's a technical breakthrough, a new partner, or a potential client. Surprise guests: Founders and operators behind some of the most exciting companies often drop in, as well as other investors and good humans. Great food, drinks, people, and vibes: The PWV ecosystem is one of the best communities in venture and tech. Period. Spots are limited. RSVP now. We'd love to see you!
